ComicInfo.Title: The Living Nightmare - Part One
ComicInfo.Summary:
A.I.M. has taken over New York City and mind-controlled many of its strongest super heroes! A small band of heroes struggles to fight back... but will they be any match for the Yellow Hulk?! The concluding storyline to the first phase of Marvel Action: Avengers!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Jon Sommariva | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Luca Claretti | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-24 06:01:50. [CVDB762354]
ComicInfo.Characters: Black Panther, Black Widow, Captain America, Carol Danvers, Hank Pym, Hawkeye, Hulk, Iron Man, Kkallakku, Scarlet Witch, Spider-Man, Thor, Wasp
